statements: SELECT * FROM expenses
SELECT expense_id, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT expense_id, expense_description FROM expenses WHERE expense_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT expense_id, expense_amount, expense_description FROM expenses WHERE employee_id = 5 ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT expense_id, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM reimbursements WHERE reimbursement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_expenses FROM expenses;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT employee_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 50
SELECT employee_id, MAX(amount) AS highest_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM expenses WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT id, expense_id, amount FROM reimbursements WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM reimbursements ORDER BY amount DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT e.name, e.department, r.amount FROM employees e JOIN reimbursements r ON e.id = r.employee_id WHERE r.amount >= 5000;
SELECT e.name, e.email, SUM(r.amount) as total_reimbursement FROM employees e JOIN reimbursements r ON e.id = r.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name, e.department, SUM(e.amount) as total_expense FROM employees e JOIN expenses ex ON e.id = ex.employee_id GROUP BY e.name, e.department ORDER BY total_expense DESC;

SELECT e.name, e.department, COUNT(ex.id) as expense_count FROM employees e LEFT JOIN expenses ex ON e.id = ex.employee_id WHERE ex.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY e.name, e.department ORDER BY expense_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_id, expense_description, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reimbursements WHERE reimbursement_amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_id, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount < 500 AND expense_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT reimbursement_id, reimbursement_amount, reimbursement_date FROM reimbursements ORDER BY reimbursement_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY employee_id HAVING SUM(expense_amount) > 1000
SELECT e.employee_name, m.manager_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN managers m ON e.manager_id = m.manager_id
SELECT e.employee_name, r.reimbursement_amount FROM employees e LEFT JOIN reimbursements r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500 AND expense_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE manager_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_id, category, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, reimbursement_date, amount FROM employees JOIN reimbursements ON employees.employee_id = reimbursements.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, email, department FROM employees WHERE department IN ('Engineering', 'Marketing') AND manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_name, expense_date, category, amount FROM employees JOIN expenses ON employees.employee_id = expenses.employee_id WHERE amount > 1000;

SELECT employees.employee_name, reimbursements.reimbursement_date, reimbursements.amount FROM employees JOIN reimbursements ON employees.employee_id = reimbursements.employee_id WHERE employees.employee_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY reimbursements.reimbursement_date DESC;
SELECT manager_name, department_name, COUNT(*) AS employee_count FROM managers JOIN departments ON managers.department = departments.department_name GROUP BY manager_name, department_name;
